items.content_html: A simple, interactive Quiz App built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project allows users to test their knowledge by answering multiple-choice questions and provides instant feedback for each answer. The app is lightweight, responsive, and designed to be beginner-friendly, making it a great starting point for learning web development concepts.
items.title: 4702chahat/Quiz-App: A simple, interactive Quiz App built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project allows users to test their knowledge by answering multiple-choice questions and provides instant feedback for each answer. The app is lightweight, responsive, and designed to be beginner-friendly, making it a great starting point for learning web development concepts.
